title: Out of ram when compiling simple invalid code
body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->
Hi,
I have on my machine 24GB of Ram, but all was taken by Rust when it try to compile this invalid code:

```rust
fn main() {

                data_vector.push(GtkRowData {
                    modification_date: "".to_string()
                }
                println!("{}", "ssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss".to_string());
                )
}
}
```

but compiling this code(which only have smaller amount of `s`):
```rust
fn main() {

                data_vector.push(GtkRowData {
                    modification_date: "".to_string()
                }
                println!("{}", "ssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss".to_string());
                )
}

```
cause showing of correct error message
```
error: expected one of `)`, `,`, `.`, `?`, or an operator, found `println`
 --> src/main.rs:7:17
  |
6 |                   }
  |                    - expected one of `)`, `,`, `.`, `?`, or an operator
  |  __________________|
  | |
7 | |                 println!("{}", "ssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss".to_string());
  | | |               ^^^^^^^ unexpected token
  | |_|
  |   help: missing `,`

error: expected one of `)`, `,`, `.`, `?`, or an operator, found `;`
 --> src/main.rs:7:85
  |
7 |                 println!("{}", "ssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss".to_string());
  |                                                                                     ^ expected one of `)`, `,`, `.`, `?`, or an operator

error[E0425]: cannot find value `data_vector` in this scope
 --> src/main.rs:4:17
  |
4 |                 data_vector.push(GtkRowData {
  |                 ^^^^^^^^^^^ not found in this scope

error[E0422]: cannot find struct, variant or union type `GtkRowData` in this scope
 --> src/main.rs:4:34
  |
4 |                 data_vector.push(GtkRowData {
  |                                  ^^^^^^^^^^ not found in this scope

error: aborting due to 4 previous errors
```

### Steps to reproduce
1. Download project - [Test.zip](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/5250916/Test.zip)
2. Run project by `cargo run`
3. Wait until there are no memory

### Meta
<!--
If you're using the stable version of the compiler, you should also check if the
bug also exists in the beta or nightly versions.
-->

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.46.0 (04488afe3 2020-08-24)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 04488afe34512aa4c33566eb16d8c912a3ae04f9
commit-date: 2020-08-24
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.46.0
LLVM version: 10.0

```
